website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive device with adequate performance that would suit most home users. The best deal for the lowest price.
pros: Adequate distance-to-spot ratio and emissivity figures
cons: Not as accurate as some pricier competitors

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly useful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband when it was on sale. He said, "What do I need that for?" Well, I was thinking his BBQ or something... but, whatever. This just meant I kept it. Shows him for not being appreciative. I NOW use it to double check the temperature on my heat press for doing vinyl, and I have used it to double check the temperature in rooms compared to my house thermostat. AND my kids have swiped it and had a grand old time before I took it away. I hope they didn't fry their tiny retinas with the laser... Point being, it survived the toddlers and still works.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Payne Hay

customer_reviews.title: Are you into tools that work for a few weeks? Boy do I have an offer for you!
customer_reviews.text: I do HVAC work and used this instead of climbing up on a ladder with a probe. It worked well for about 3 weeks then it started misreading by 14 degrees. So it was back to the ladder & probe.
customer_reviews.author: Shango

customer_reviews.title: Easily Test the Temperature of Several Items
customer_reviews.text: I Love this Thermometer. I use it everywhere. The Oven to test for doneness. I also Appreciate the fact I can check the Temperature of my Pool Water all over the Pool. Thermometer’s on a String only tells you the Temperature of Water where placed. If you place a Regular Temperature in a place that’s always Sunny, you could be mislead about the actual Temperature if the water. The same error could happen in place that is always in the Shade. You can’t move that a Regular Thermometer around unless you have several places you can Hang it. The Infrared Thermometer measure all the way to the bottom of the pool. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Some aspects are cheap and hard to use, but overall it seems good
customer_reviews.text: When I received it, the label panel had already fallen off, which made me nervous. The instructions were poorly translated to English, and the different settings for different surfaces is a little confusing. I have no way of verifying the accuracy, though I can usually tell when it's in the ballpark, but it IS otherwise easy to use and my husband LOVES to go around 'shooting' things and reading the temp. Using a 9 volt battery is nice, as they seem to last a lot longer than things like AAs.
customer_reviews.author: Mouriana

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking!  And a TON of other things
customer_reviews.text: I've already used this product in ways I never imagined. My friends A/C wasn't working...this confirmed it. I bought it for cooking temperatures...some recipes, like making crepes...and the heat of the pan is important. This works great. Easy. Accurate. Definitely two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It's the same temperature no matter what you're testing, right
customer_reviews.text: This is the most useless thing I've ever bought at amazon. I wouldn't give you a star if I could give you zero. When you buy something, if you're not happy with it, it may not be the right size or function. This thermometer, however, is a piece of junk. To be honest, I was so angry with my shopping so much that I waited for half a month or so to buy it. It didn't work when I received it. The battery died and I bought a new one. After a long time, it is finally ready to be used. As a result, no matter what temperature is tested, it shows 34.7. What kind of thermometer is this?
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this a lot to find out where we have cool air coming in. It works amazingly well. We also used it to find the temperature of some bar top epoxy which had to be at least 75% to set (we had to use heaters as the garage was colder). It is easy to use and works well. I think everyone needs on of these.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Only for industrial temps
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I now understand the 1022 is an ‘industrial’ thermometer, not meant for testing humans. There are other models which are accurate within a narrow range of human body temps. This is for ovens, pipes, etc I bought the 1022 on amazon It reads 34F for ice water (2 degrees high, not bad) but then immediately measures my family’s temperature at 91-94F (5-8 degrees low... horrible! we'd be in hypothermia!). I’ve played around with emissity but it doesn’t help. There doesn't seem to be a way to calibrate the temp. I've emailed Etekcity directly but my expectations are low. Thus is probably okay If you need approximate temps (oven, fireplace, etc) but ifneed something accurate, buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Mountain View

customer_reviews.title: Very inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: This product is not at all accurate. Though following instructions it gave a range of forehead temperatures from 89 degrees to 105 degrees. I then compared it to an old fashion oral thermometer which read 98.6 (normal). I then tried it on my wife, and got the same range of temperatures. Her temperature with the oral thermometer was 97.8 degrees, normal for her. This product will give false readings, and therefore medically misleading, especially at this time of COVID-19 when it is essential to get accurate body temperature readings. I did not use it until recently, when my wife thought she had a fever, and it is apparently too late to return to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Badgerette

customer_reviews.title: good fun product
customer_reviews.text: when I first received this...my wife said i would never use it. I took it to work the first day and the air went out. I was checking the temperature around the office...sort of a novelty. then I carry it in my bag. We had a school that was remodeled and the dampers were not properly installed in an area...I was able to check the temperature and helped the contractor pinpoint the issue. now, it is part of my measuring, photo and building document tool bag. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy S.

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool- snakes geckos bearded dragons.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is perfect for what I needed it for I have 5 tanks that I need to be watching the temperature on. This does come with directions that you do have to comprehend you can't be shooting this off across the room and get an accurate read you need to be within 17 in. Which is totally possible! this works great it's fast read it's comfortable to hold it's perfect for reading the hot side of the tank and the cold side of the tank. I also used this in conjunction with sticky thermometers that stay on the inside of the tank that measure heat and humidity. But this is a great product I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Haden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for taking rectal temperature
customer_reviews.text: Me and my dog were sitting on the couch and her tail was wagging and I thought about her health. I want what’s best for my little friend so I wanted to take a rectal temperature to see if she was healthy, I ordered this and pointed it directly at her b- hole which she keeps immaculate by constantly licking and it read perfectly. I’m so happy now I run around my neighborhood pointing the little laser at cow b- holes, sheep, goats, basically anything naked and bent over is fair game.
customer_reviews.author: Roach God

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and convenient to have around the house or shop
customer_reviews.text: These have really improved over time. This is an easy to use unit and can be useful for various checks around the house and workshop. You can use it to check your refrigerator status for temp control on one end and then use it to check the calibration of your soldering iron on the other. For 20.00 it can't be beat for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Go play poker or the slot machine it'll give you a better number
customer_reviews.text: Worked once on the batteries that were sent. Put new batteries in and still only worked once. Tried to return it and customer service gave me a hard time so I just chalked it up as a loss
customer_reviews.author: FrankNbeans

customer_reviews.title: very handy and versatile temperature thermometer
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for measuring surface temperature of wood burning stove, but have found all sorts of other uses, like temperature of a molten paraffin bath in slow cooker or temperature of boiled water before pouring over tea leaves. The thermometer is easy to use, with well-designed battery compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Starosta

customer_reviews.title: Did not even last a year. Worked well for ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not even last a year. Worked well for 6 months (checking griddle temperatures maybe twice a month) then the trigger started to get stuck so that the laser would not turn off. Had to pull the battery to get it to turn off. Once I put the battery back in, it never came back on. Even after trying a new battery it wouldn't work. For $15, I guess I got my money's worth but now I need to find a different one.
customer_reviews.author: B. W.

customer_reviews.title: Packages Thrown over 6 cement wall into knee high weeds
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered over 6 ft cement wall in knee deep weeds. It had to be thrown, as there is no gate or other opening. Packages I'mThrown over cement wall , despite commercially printed metal sign requesting deliveries inside the gate next to the sign. The wall used at least 30 feet from gate indicated on moo sign
customer_reviews.author: queencaren

customer_reviews.title: What's the temp???
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty awesome! I can't put the thing down! What's the temp of this? What about this over here. Hmm what about this thing up here. Ohhh what about that!??? Whatever I point to I can count on it giving me an answer on what temp it is.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Timineri

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: Didn't use this for what we wanted to. Instructions not clear. Description wasn't accurate as far as we're concerned. If we had all the packaging we'd return it in a heartbeat. But we kept trying, thinking it SURELY had to work. Never did. Total waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: hours of enjoyment...keeps me on my toes.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive time saving device
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use without having to worry about ruining a more expensive temp gun in the harsh conditions we deal with shock testing. It seems to provide accurate results and not needing to convert temp readings from C° to F° or vice versa makes it easier and quicker to use. It's always extremely dusty testing shocks off road and this temp gun seemed to not have any issues with the heat or dust.I put a phone type screen cover on it as we wipe dust off constantly and I don't want to deal with a really scratched screen in the future but the rest is as is and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and affordable thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to test the temperature of our spa and pool. So far it has worked great. I have no way of verifying the accuracy of the reading but it seems accurate. It was reading our spa at 102 which is right where our thermostat is set. I would recommend this product to anyone looking to get a fast temperature read out. For the price, I am super happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Works well, one little flaw
customer_reviews.text: So far it has worked very well. However I just discovered that the battery connecter can become detached from one side of the battery. I installed it facing the other way in the battery compartment, hopefully this keeps it all together.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisp

customer_reviews.title: Temperature spot on, great dog and cat toy laser.
customer_reviews.text: It gets five stars because it’s not just a thermometer it’s also a cat toy and a dog toy. My cat chases that laser nonstop and sodas my 180 pound French mastiff. It was worth the wait it took forever to get it shipped to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Missleading Product description
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to use it for reading body temperature, and found it to be several degrees off as compared to a standard thermometer. When I called customer support, they told me that it is only suitable for reading oven/ refrigerator's temperatures. Product description in the Amazon is misleading and I am considering to return the product..
customer_reviews.author: Vishnu Mathur

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Perfect for Reptile Enclosures
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, perfect for the Lightning Deal price. We use this to test the temperatures in the different areas of our reptile enclosures and find it to be accurate and line up with our other temperature equipment. It allowed us to take good spot measurements without moving probes around and find hot spots using the area functions. Simply hold down the trigger and paint an area and it will provide multiple readings, including the highest in an area.
customer_reviews.author: KnifeCrisis

customer_reviews.title: ... Non-contact Digital Laser Infrared Thermometer in blue is a wonderful way to tell the temperature of just about anything ...
customer_reviews.text: Etekcity Lasergrip 1022 Non-contact Digital Laser Infrared Thermometer in blue is a wonderful way to tell the temperature of just about anything with ease. You aim the infrared beam at any object or liquid you need to tell the temperature. Easy!! I used this to check several temperatures. I tried a glass of tap water. Temp. 72.3 F. I put ice in the water. Temp. 24.3 F. My deck gets extremely hot for the little ones. Temp. 121.1 F. My pool water 87.8 F. (Great for swimming!) This is a great thermometer that is easy to use. I received this item at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiast opinion.
customer_reviews.author: CarolJ15455

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly useful device. I mainly use this for cooking and its miles more convenient than sticking a a thermometer into a fish fillet or chicken breast. Simply slice the meat open and point the laser in the middle and get a reading. Ten times easier than trying a probe thermometer. I suppose I have no standard to hold it against to test the accuracy, but I've been using it to cook fish and chicken, and haven't been sick yet....so I guess it's probably pretty accurate lol.
customer_reviews.author: robert volm

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: It's at least 10 degrees off. Not helpful at all fur determing body temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat little gadget
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago and it holds up nicely so far. It is an infrared thermometer that detects only surface temperatures, which is great for seeing if oil in a skillet is hot enough. The thermometer does shut off on it's own in a relatively short time which can sometimes be an annoyance if you're checking something and having to wait a couple seconds after you pull the trigger to read again. But it's manageable and something anybody could get use to.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: So more accurate than manually checking or putting a probe into the product. Great after microwaving.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate on human temperatures
customer_reviews.text: The picture is the temperature from my wife’s forehead. The reason it gets one star is that it is not accurate for humans. Why would I want to buy a thermometer so I can measure the temperature of the floor?!
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: NO quality at all!
customer_reviews.text: This product was given to a family member. She just opened it. Following instructions she tested on herself and kids. Surprisingly, all of the readings were below 33C! Then she used a regular thermometer to test again, and everyone’s temperature is in the range of 36.3-36.8C. This product failed to provide accurate readings! I wanted to return it, but it’s over the return period! Extremely disappointed at this quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I measured the same item on three different occasions and got three different reading so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do a good job
customer_reviews.text: The accuracy seems very close to the true temp. I used this to measure the temperature of truck tires after coming off the highway and it measured quickly and accurately. Make sure you follow the directions for length it shows.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M.

customer_reviews.title: Beats a 50$ unit when it does the same job just as well
customer_reviews.text: This probably isn't for lab use, might be a few degrees off but I didn't buy it for precision. It feels sturdy and takes drops like an absolute champ. It works rather well and the batteries last a while. Probably the best one to buy out of the budget infared thermometers on Amazon in terms of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have a salt block that we cook on and also a flat top grill. We need to be able to tell the temperature before using them, and this does a great job of that. I like how it is digital and you don't have to touch it to the object you are measuring the temp of. We have had it for several months now and it still works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: It's crap
customer_reviews.text: This product was imported from China and unfortunately was not calibrated correctly. YOU WILL NOT GET AN ACCURATE TEMPERATURE READING!!! I highly advise picking another product. I spent 3 weeks trying to get this product to work and unfortunately missed my return date and thus I'm stuck with this piece of crap. Amazon should spend more time evaluating the products that are being listed, especially when those products pertain to COVID!!
customer_reviews.author: Beverley Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR HUMAN USE
customer_reviews.text: It may detect the proper surface temperature of inanimate objects, but it doesn't register proper temperature for humans like other surface-touch thermometers do. For me it was a cheap movie prop, so fine, but if you're looking for something for human use, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, well built and fairly accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy so far with the thermometer. I use it to check the temp of my HVAC returns in my house and it's very convenient to use. I am confident in it's accuracy as well, as the thermometer registers surface temps in my house to be no more than 1 degree different than my indoor thermometers and thermostat. The thermometer itself is well built and comfortable in the hand. I like using it and my wife laughs at me while I measure the temp of everything around me (including her haha).
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave in your car!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing for the cost. I put 3 stars because Day 2 of owning it, I left it in my car for one full day (temp outside was 80 max) and the screen bubbled and popped off. The device still works but no longer has plastic covering screen which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Product, No Star if possible.
customer_reviews.text: Watch out before buying. Doesn't even work. Used a different battery but still doesn't work. Put the batteries in different directions but still nothing. Please don't sell products that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Too_Lit_2_Quit

customer_reviews.title: This Thermometer is easy to use  on your food when cooking
customer_reviews.text: We used this to take the temperature of the Turkey we cooked this past Thanksgiving. It was perfect and allowed for us to have the peace of mind that our Turkey was fully cooked and had reached the ideal temperature before we ate it. It was easy to use and and awesome. I recommend it to anyone considering a food thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Silva

customer_reviews.title: this just works
customer_reviews.text: This is a great IR thermometer at a reasonable price. I have not checked accuracy against a calibration point (boiling water or ice) but it's good enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: A normal person

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well.
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. I originally purchased it to measure the temperature of my new HVAC as I felt I wasn't getting a correct reading from the thermostat and my hand held thermometer. According to this device, I was correct (had that repaired). I have since discovered it is also excellent at reading the temperature of my pool and spa.
customer_reviews.author: S. O'Day

customer_reviews.title: It is not a thermometer for PEOPLE!
customer_reviews.text: I returned it, did not know it was for mechanical objects, would be great if you had a swimming pool, or maybe camp stove, just flash and temp read! Not for people!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to temp baking surfaces, specifically for making pizza on the grill. Works great. Should have bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, not only is it great in the kitchen, but you might be surprised to find that it has a bunch of other uses you may never even have suspected you would be curious about (i.e. checking air conditioner vents etc).
customer_reviews.author: Robert Punt

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very accurate taking temperature readings, Great on batteries. I have absolutely no issues with this temp gun. I do think the temp gun needs a storage case that's the only reason I held back a star.
customer_reviews.author: T.E.G

customer_reviews.title: very cool tool
customer_reviews.text: i use this tool on a daily, it helps me to get the temp on the work i do. very accurate and for the price its a deal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband .. he said it does exactly what its supposed to do . Very rarely its finicky and takes a few trys to get an accurate reading and get passed an error message but over all a great little gadget
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Noel

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, affordable, good temp gun for the hobbyist.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good buy for the money., I think the price was under $20 when I bought it and it has a 2 or 3 year warranty. I have found it to be fairly accurate. Came with a battery and is super simple to use. If you register the product at their website they extend the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jakobe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use temperature monitor
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised, easy to use. Has a nice clear LCD screen, buttons are not too small. The unit measures temperatures and can be adjusted for the emissivity of the material (chart included). It's fairly compact, lightweight and fits the hand well. Great for quick measurements. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mazowiesky

customer_reviews.title: Hard to know how accurate it is
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was a great item, but a handyman helping us with something said it was worthless. 🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product open box. Works great couldnt be happier with the price. I heard its a couple degrees off true temp. But its enough to get a general idea of what the temp is.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Unexpectedly useful when operating a Woodstove. I can monitor flue pipe and stove temperature, and make better decisions about when to add wood, adjust airflow lever, and when to throw the efficiency lever on my Vermont Castings Woodstove.
customer_reviews.author: RickWAllen

customer_reviews.title: How hot is that?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thing to double check temperatures while I'm smoking meat. I find myself now wanting To know the temperature of everything around me all the time and I can with a push of the button. I have not yet used it for smoking but I am well aware of the temperature of everything on my back Deck. It's a great product that works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: tim wood

customer_reviews.title: Darn good deal.
customer_reviews.text: It's no substitute for a kitchen thermometer, but accurately displays temperature on every surface. I read some reviews about it dying out after the provided 9 volt battery does.. Granted I've seen people that can't connect one properly!
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in good condition. Easy to put in batteries and instructions work well. Seems accurate to me and does what I need it to do. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for checking tire temp on camper.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for checking the temp of cast iron griddle that I use on my camp stove and the tire temperature when I stop to refuel with my 5th wheel camper. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use. I use it for 6 of my reptiles pretty much everyday. I would recommend this product. I think the accuracy is pretty spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Here's what I use it for. Works a treat. 1) Checking the Air Conditioning output vents, normally too high to reach without 2) Checking BBQ temp to see if its ready to cook without getting out of my chair\ 3) Checking operation of pool solar panels Does well in all 3. Note that 1&3 dont require absolute accuracy -- the thing could be off a few degrees and you'd never notice; its the difference that is important
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun to use. A necessity in the home.
customer_reviews.text: Have been wanting one for awhile. I love it. Works great, is accurate and I discovered you can use it to check your own body heat. Fevers, etc. Very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Minei

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: How did I live without this?? Perfect for deep frying, and tandoori cooking. Very easy to use, and despite other reviews, the battery lasts! We got it 3-4 months ago, and despite regular use, it is still going. I love the fact it turns on easily with a pull of the trigger, and automatic shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Jawbreaker

customer_reviews.title: great for plumbers
customer_reviews.text: Im a nyc plumber who looks for return line leaks that are under concrete slabs, when the surface is warmer, you know the leak is near. works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessedog11

customer_reviews.title: Good kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little product. It shows the temperature of the wok, and I can get the dog to chase the laser out of the kitchen...
customer_reviews.author: S. PHILLIPS

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Never read temperature correctly. No matter from what distance. The screen already is broken only showing half the visual numerics. I wish I would I not have thrown away the packaging immediately so I could return. Now it's simply an expensive toy to tease my cat with the laser. No real value.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wolfenberg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Wish I had bought it earlier, rather than waste my money on flimsy digital thermometers
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and accuracy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for soap making because the lye mixture and hot water have to be within10° of each other when mixing them. This makes it so much easier. And it's fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son to use in his snakes tank. Works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie deJesus

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: use for my swimming pool and it works great. Keeps the kids away from always picking up the thermometer from the pool to check the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great for monitoring reptile cage temperatures.
customer_reviews.text: Also great for making our dog go batsh*t crazy with the laser pointer.
customer_reviews.author: Tim F

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing!! So fun to use and do useful!! Super fast and I get to check my snakes' habitats temp.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Santana

customer_reviews.title: laser thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I am caregiver for two adults. These thermometers are easy to use, and really work well.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Brann

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Used it once. Used it again today and it shuts off immediately when you hit the trigger. Return window closed. Waste of $20
customer_reviews.author: SomeoneOutThere

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and a great source of amusement.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not disappoint. Very reasonably priced, and it seems to corroborate readings from other thermometers. Great for checking automotive air conditioning temperature at the vents, smartphone surface temperatures, coworkers, etc. You'll find yourself pointing this at all sorts of things. Dashboards, driveways, light bulbs, etc. A lot more amusing than I had counted on. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Richard B

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Use it to get temps of my rc's motor and esc
customer_reviews.author: Soke

customer_reviews.title: When it's hot check it with Etekcity
customer_reviews.text: When our bailier burned down. Do to a bearing going out. I decided to get one of these and I've been happy ever since. I check the bairings every few bails now with this thermometer and it gives me a reading every time.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Unit is garbage
customer_reviews.text: Purchase of this item is the straw that broke the camel's back. I will NEVER (if possible) buy anything Made in China ever again. The quality is utterly horrible. I opened the package on this unit, pulled out the tab to engage the battery, pointed it at the floor, and pulled the trigger. The floor read 125F degrees!!! I pointed at the ceiling and it read 97F. Additionally every time I pressed the trigger I got a reading off by 20 degrees. This thing is junk. I am returning to AMAZON. I want my $25 back.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: Hard to figure out calibration. Not accurate but still trying to figure out a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Horseland

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Got this product to check temperatures in the refrigerator and freezer. The temperatures checked out as they should be.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Moore

customer_reviews.title: One of the best items bought on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Of all products bought on Amazon this is amongst the most satisfying one. Works like a charm. Superhandy. Dont have to climb inside the pool to take temperature readings, measure grill and oven heat, even measured the tip of a lighted cigarette (218 C). Ice (-20 C) Scans and holds highest reading for you evaluation. Amazing.

customer_reviews.text: you can not get the same reading twice. Shows I have 105 temp then says I have an 83 with in 2 secs Will not buy again

customer_reviews.title: Works great

customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: but I found it to be surprisingly useful. It works far better than my thermometer for ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really have an intended purpose for this product when I bought it, but I found it to be surprisingly useful. It works far better than my thermometer for measuring the temperature of frying oil. I also used it to measure the temperature of wax for pouring candles. I am not certain how accurate it is, but for these purposes being within a few degrees is plenty. It was nice to get the reading in a fraction of a second, as opposed to 6-10 seconds my thermometer takes.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: I bought three of them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of them on diffrent orders, you can use this for over 1000 things. The main thing I love about this you can check for air leaks in the windows. The temperature is rignt on the money. I can go on for ever on this Lasergrip. The other two are for Christmas gifts.

product_meta.title: Etekcity 1022 Digital Laser Infrared Thermometer Temperature Gun Non-contact -58℉~1022℉ (-50℃ ~ 550℃) with Adjustable Emissivity & Max Measure for Meat Refrigerator Pool Oven, Blue (Not for Human)
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue & Gray| Style Name:Infrared Thermometer 1022Accurate temperature measurement: With infrared technology and an adjustable emissivity, the 1022 thermometer obtains accurate results instantaneously. 

Simplify your life : Measure hazardous and hard-to-reach surface，whether used to find air leaks or to take the temperature reading of a car engine. Antiskid handle: This Infrared Thermometer tackles the toughest jobs with ease thanks to a weather and scratch resistant UV paint coating, covering a scratch resistant polished plastic. 

Features & Specifications: 
1. Measurement Range: -50°C~550°C (-58°F~1022°F) 
2. Storage Temperature: -20°C to 50°C (-4°F to 122°F) 
3. Operating Temperature: 0°C to 50°C (32°F to 122°F) 
4. Accuracy:±2% /±2°C 
5. Adjustable Emissivity:0.1-1.0 
6. Resolution: 0.1°F /°C 
7. Distance to Spot Ratio: 12:1 
8. Selected Thermometer units: °C /°F 
9. Response Time: <500ms
10. Battery/ Battery Life: 9V / about 12 hours 

Package Included: 
1x Etekcity Lasergrip 1022 Thermometer 
1x 9V DC Battery 
1x User's Manual 

Note: 
1. This thermometer cannot test the temperature of target objects through across the glass. Besides, the steam, dust, smog will lower the accuracy of testing. 
2. To make better accuracy, cover the surface to be measured with masking tape or flat black paint.
feature_bullets: BETTER ACCURACY: The distance to spot ratio is 12: 1; Measure surface temperature ranging from -58°F ~1022°F / -50°C ~ 550°C; With higher precision ≥100°C2% / ≤100°C2°C, meaning the Laser grip 1022 assure greater accuracy; Response time: ≤500Ms

ADJUSTABLE EMISSIVITY: Emissivity is the measure of an object's ability to emit infrared energy. Emitted energy indicates the temperature of the object. Adjustable emissivity improves measurement accuracy across different surface types, just regulate the emissivity of your 1022 according to the instruction（0. 1-1. 0）

MULTIFUNCTION: 1022 features with maximum measure function; The LCD screen is back-light, it also has an auto-off function and a low battery indicator to extend the battery life so you never accidentally run out of juice (battery included)

VERSATILE DESIGN: Infrared Technology makes this thermometer handy to measure the surface temperature of various objects especially temperatures above boiling points and below freezing points; Use it when you are cooking and barbequing, performing auto maintenance, doing home repairs, and a host of other tasks

NOTE: For best accuracy, the distance between the thermometer and object of measurement should approximately be 14. 17 inches (36cm); Temperature readings from this devices are inanimate objects, the measured temperature for humans or animals will not be correct; FDA, FCC, CE compliant; Class 2 laser, optical power 0. 5-0. 9mW
This product is an industrial thermometer which should be not intended for medial usage.
